metadata.title: CVE-2018-9860 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Botan 1.11.32 through 2.x before 2.6.0. Anoff-by-one error when processing malformed TLS-CBC ciphertext could causethe receiving side to include in the HMAC computation exactly 64K bytes ofdata following the record buffer, aka an over-read. The MAC comparison willsubsequently fail and the connection will be closed. This could be used fordenial of service. No information leak occurs.

criterions.comment: botan1.10 package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
